entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning and afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
